response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly benefit and enhance your operations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 11000}
